duties_responsibilities.duty: Spearhead the planning, resource allocation, and coordination of dynamic construction projects.
Ensure projects stay on course by adhering to budgetary guidelines without compromising quality or safety.
Demonstrate an exemplary history of consistently completing projects on schedule.
Foster collaborative efforts with project superintendents and company leadership to achieve shared company goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Science/Management, Engineering, or a related field.
